[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-omv-datasource](./harp-omv-datasource.md) &gt; [OmvDataSourceParameters](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.md)

## OmvDataSourceParameters interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OmvDataSourceParameters extends DataSourceOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addGroundPlane](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.addgroundplane.md) | boolean | Indicates whether to add a ground plane to cover the tile completely. This is necessary for the fallback logic, such that the parent fall back tiles don't overlap the children tiles. Default is true (i.e. if not defined it is taken to be true) |
|  [concurrentDecoderScriptUrl](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.concurrentdecoderscripturl.md) | string | Specify the URL to the decoder bundle. If not supplied, the default will be used. |
|  [copyrightInfo](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.copyrightinfo.md) | [CopyrightInfo](./harp-mapview.copyrightinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional, default copyright information of tiles provided by this data source. Implementation should provide this information from the source data if possible. |
|  [copyrightProvider](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.copyrightprovider.md) | [CopyrightProvider](./harp-mapview.copyrightprovider.md) | Optional copyright info provider for tiles provided by this data source. |
|  [createTileInfo](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.createtileinfo.md) | boolean |  |
|  [dataProvider](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.dataprovider.md) | [DataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.md) | Optionally specify the DataProvider that should be used. |
|  [decoder](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.decoder.md) | [ITileDecoder](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.md) | Specify the decoder that should be used. If not supplied, the default will be used. |
|  [enableElevationOverlay](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.enableelevationoverlay.md) | boolean | Indicates whether overlay on elevation is enabled. Defaults to <code>false</code>. |
|  [featureModifierId](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.featuremodifierid.md) | [FeatureModifierId](./harp-omv-datasource.featuremodifierid.md) | Identifier used to choose \[\[OmvFeatureModifier\]\]s to be applied.<!-- -->If left <code>undefined</code> at least \[\[OmvGenericFeatureModifier\]\] will be applied. The list of feature modifiers may be extended internally by some data source options such as \[\[politicalView\]\] which adds \[\[OmvPoliticalViewFeatureModifier\]\]. This parameter gets applied to the decoder used in the \[\[OmvDataSource\]\] which might be shared between various \[\[OmvDataSource\]\]s. |
|  [filterDescr](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.filterdescr.md) | [OmvFeatureFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescription.md) | A description for the feature filter that can be safely passed down to the web workers. It has to be generated with the help of the \[\[OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder\]\] (to guarantee correctness). This parameter gets applied to the decoder used in the \[\[OmvDataSource\]\] which might be shared between various \[\[OmvDataSource\]\]s. |
|  [gatherFeatureAttributes](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.gatherfeatureattributes.md) | boolean | Gather feature attributes from <code>OmvData</code>. Defaults to <code>false</code>. |
|  [gatherFeatureIds](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.gatherfeatureids.md) | boolean | Gather feature IDs from <code>OmvData</code>. Defaults to <code>false</code>. @<!-- -->deprecated, FeatureIds are always gathered, use \[\[gatherFeatureAttributes\]\] to gather all feature attributes. |
|  [gatherRoadSegments](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.gatherroadsegments.md) | boolean |  |
|  [maxGeometryHeight](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.maxgeometryheight.md) | number | Maximum geometry height above groud level this <code>OmvDataSource</code> can produce.<!-- -->Used in first stage of frustum culling before \[\[Tile.maxGeometryHeight\]\] data is available. \[\[EarthConstants.MAX\_BUILDING\_HEIGHT\]\]. |
|  [politicalView](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.politicalview.md) | string | Expresses specific country point of view that is used when rendering disputed features, like borders, names, etc. If undefined "defacto" or most widely accepted political view will be presented. featureModifiers |
|  [showMissingTechniques](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.showmissingtechniques.md) | boolean | If set to <code>true</code>, features that have no technique in the theme will be printed to the console (can be excessive!). |
|  [skipShortLabels](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.skipshortlabels.md) | boolean | If not set to <code>false</code>, very short text labels will be skipped during decoding based on a heuristic. |
|  [tileFactory](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.tilefactory.md) | [TileFactory](./harp-mapview-decoder.tilefactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;[OmvTile](./harp-omv-datasource.omvtile.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Optional, custom factory for \[\[Tile\]\] instances created by this \[\[OmvDataSource\]\]. |
